For those of you having problems:

These files are in NRG format (why uploaders can't just use ISO or BIN/CUE which almost every disc image software - including Nero - can create or burn I'll never known).

NRG is a disc image format used by Nero. A few other disc image apps can use Nero but most can't can't.

NRG is very close to BIN though, so in SOME cases renaming the files to BIN will work thereby allowing you to burn or mount with your favourite software but in most cases it will fail.

You will either need to download and install Nero or use one of the small apps you can get that can change an NRG file to a BIN or ISO first.

Once you download the image files, either mount them in your compatible software or burn the image files to disc. You'll then be able to install.

When the LOGIN screen appears, just click Cancel and you can create an account for yourself. Don't worry, this is just for creating an account to login to the training, it wont send your details to anywhere.

If you are having problems playing the videos it may be because you either don't have the correct codecs (in which case download and install a codec pack such as K-LITE) or check your video card settings if you already have K-Lite installed.

Finally, you can use the programs update feature to get the latest versions and latest questions, it seems to work fine and doesn't require a crack or activation.

The Labsim testout programs use the NAVIGATOR and the SIMULATOR programs, and will need to be installed according to what you are currently doing.

The navigator (FOR ME) was installed on a NAVIGATOR standalone CD, and then I installed my courses after that.

For sure, the standalone CD for the navigator and the simulator are able to be downloaded form the VC# 2003 course here
